programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Tiger, Wolf i Josh žele uloviti Biotica na božićnoj zabavi Kronish laboratorija kako bi mogli ukrasti vremenski stroj. A to će lako obaviti. Otrovat će slasticu i samo Biotici neće podleći tom otrovu.... Tiger, Wolf i Josh žele uloviti Biotica na božićnoj zabavi Kronish laboratorija kako bi mogli ukrasti vremenski stroj. A to će lako obaviti. Otrovat će slasticu i samo Biotici neće podleći tom otrovu. U međuvremenu, Josh se zbližava sa svojom kolegicom Jeri koja mu pomaže izbjeći opsesivnog policajca koji mu je za petama.

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Josh, Tiger i Wolf odu u budućnost, u 2023. g., ukrasti gorivo koje očajnički trebaju da nastave s misijom. Ako ne uspiju, zauvijek će ostati u 2023. g. Ali kad dođu na svoje odredište, suoče se s... Josh, Tiger i Wolf odu u budućnost, u 2023. g., ukrasti gorivo koje očajnički trebaju da nastave s misijom. Ako ne uspiju, zauvijek će ostati u 2023. g. Ali kad dođu na svoje odredište, suoče se s neočekivanim neprijateljem. Tiger je nešto obećala sama sebi: ako dobije potrebne informacije o tome kad je i gdje Kronish rođen, samo će se ona i Wolf vratiti u '50-e i ubiti maloga Kronisha. Josh i dalje ne želi da Kronish umre….

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Na pomolu je završetak misije dok se Tiger i Wolf pripremaju za završni skok u prošlost. Ali kad otmu Joshovu mamu, Josh ne da da Tiger i Wolf odu prije negoli je pokušaju spasiti. Josh odlazi u... Na pomolu je završetak misije dok se Tiger i Wolf pripremaju za završni skok u prošlost. Ali kad otmu Joshovu mamu, Josh ne da da Tiger i Wolf odu prije negoli je pokušaju spasiti. Josh odlazi u Kronishov laboratorij gdje mu se Kronish povjerava. Naime, mogao je birati između napuštanja znanosti i supruge i odlaska na jahtu sa svojim gej ljubavnikom ili ostati i posvetiti se poslu, i ostati u braku bez ljubavi. Žali zbog svoje odluke i upozorava Josha da i on ne odluči krivo. Josh odlazi iz labosa s potrebnim datumima.

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Prvi dio od dva dijela: Uvjeren da zna kako zaustaviti dr. Kronisha jednom za svagda, Josh povede ekipu na misiju u prošlost. Ali kad Wolf nestane, moraju se razići, i tako primorati Josha da svoj... Prvi dio od dva dijela: Uvjeren da zna kako zaustaviti dr. Kronisha jednom za svagda, Josh povede ekipu na misiju u prošlost. Ali kad Wolf nestane, moraju se razići, i tako primorati Josha da svoj ludi plan odradi sam. Naime, želi da se Kronish ipak ukrca na jahtu sa svojim gej ljubavnikom i da tako promijene sve - tako lijek nikad neće biti izumljen. Nalazi se u njegov kući gdje se skriva od gđe Kronish koja misli da je Josh Kronishev ljubavnik. A stvarni se ljubavnik skriva u ormaru….

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: Drugi dio od dva dijela: Josh je još u prošlosti i očajnički se trudi promijeniti budućnost dr. Kronisha a da pritom na promijeni i svoju. Prema onome što mu je pričao, Kronish u budućnosti ipak... Drugi dio od dva dijela: Josh je još u prošlosti i očajnički se trudi promijeniti budućnost dr. Kronisha a da pritom na promijeni i svoju. Prema onome što mu je pričao, Kronish u budućnosti ipak postaje tvorac super lijeka za sve bolesti. Josh pomisli da je ipak najbolje rješenje da ipak ubiju maloga Kronisha. U međuvremenu, Tiger i Wolf se posvađaju zbog Wolfove posvećenosti. No za napad na Kronishev labos trebaju stručnjaka za oružje i eksplozive: Wolfa. Kad su ga pokušali naći, saznali su da je mrtav. Kao kralj droge, ubijen je u raciji, u pucnjavi u Miamiju 1994. g.

programme.title: Odsutnost
programme.desc: Emily Byrne radi kao FBI agentica. Nestane bez traga loveći jednog od najzloglasnijih bostonskih ubojica. Emily Byrne radi kao FBI agentica. Nestane bez traga loveći jednog od najzloglasnijih bostonskih ubojica. Međutim, nekoliko godina kasnije, pronađu je u šumi, bez ikakvog sjećanja na sve te protekle godine. Nakon što se vrati kući, uviđa da se sve promijenilo tijekom njene odsutnosti. Vrlo brzo se vraća svome poslu, pa tako i istraživanju novih ubojstava.

programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.

programme.title: Navy CIS - Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen i Sam surađuju s mornaričkim kapetanom Harmonom Rabbom na hvatanju špijuna na brodu USS Allegiance; Hetty pokušava neutralizirati napad projektilima na Bliskom istoku; Kensi i Deeks zarobljeni... Callen i Sam surađuju s mornaričkim kapetanom Harmonom Rabbom na hvatanju špijuna na brodu USS Allegiance; Hetty pokušava neutralizirati napad projektilima na Bliskom istoku; Kensi i Deeks zarobljeni su u mobilnoj jedinici CIA-e u Iraku i usred napada.

programme.title: Čovjek budućnosti
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi pratimo uspon i pad Wolfa, iliti Coreyja Wolf-Harta, iliti Little Toe (Mali Prst). Kreće od trenutka kad je Wolf pobjegao od Tiger i pratimo njegov munjevit uspon od skromnog slastičara... U ovoj epizodi pratimo uspon i pad Wolfa, iliti Coreyja Wolf-Harta, iliti Little Toe (Mali Prst). Kreće od trenutka kad je Wolf pobjegao od Tiger i pratimo njegov munjevit uspon od skromnog slastičara do super kulinarske zvijezde '80-ih. Ali njegov je uspjeh gorko-slatkog okusa, jer je ostavio jedinu osobu s kojom je sve to najviše htio podijeliti: Tiger. U njegov je život ušla droga, zbog koje je i ostao bez života, u kojemu je bilo i novca i djevojaka, ali najviše mu je nedostajala ljubav. Vidimo ga u raciji koja je dovela do njegove smrti - samo ga sada Tiger i Josh izvuku i povuku natrag u budućnost.

A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2006421/","name":"Gran Hotel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk2MjQyNTAzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODI3OTM3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2006421/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lilly-benavides"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Move Over Downton Abbey!","reviewBody":"Gran Hotel has it all; gorgeous historical drama, romance, mystery, intrigue, even a serial killer. Yes, it's a bit over the top but I couldn't get enough and wish there was more. I am Spanish so speak the language but since I was born here I often needed to refer to the subtitles which was a bit annoying because I didn't want to tear my eyes away from the action. So, I understand the hesitance to watch a subtitled show but it is worth it! If you love shows like Downton Abbey or The Paradise, Watch the first episode of Gran Hotel and you will be hooked...ENJOY! P.S. This is a show made in Spain, not to be confused with "The Grand" which was a very good British variation, but not as good as "Gran Hotel".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10038,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-10-04","keywords":"telenovela,spain,timeframe 1900s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654841/","name":"Adriana Ozores"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2319146/","name":"Amaia Salamanca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2304398/","name":"Yon González"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249391/"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Un homme à la hauteur
Veličina nije bitna
programme.desc:
Un homme à la hauteur: Directed by Laurent Tirard. With Jean Dujardin, Virginie Efira, Cédric Kahn, Stéphanie Papanian. A lawyer dating a dashing, wealthy architect four and a half feet tall gets ribbed by her family, employees and jealous ex about his stature." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4699388/","name":"Un homme à la hauteur","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGNkYjQ2NDctZmI0YS00NTk2LTlmOWUtZmIxZTBjMWJlOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDA2NTMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lawyer dating a dashing, wealthy architect four and a half feet tall gets ribbed by her family, employees and jealous ex about his stature.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4699388/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CineMuseFilms"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A delightful French farce that is funny and sad and loaded with charm.","reviewBody":"You'll search far and wide to find a positive review of this film but you have found one here. Like every romantic farce, Up For Love (2016) is a comedy based on situational humour rather than dialogue or action. It's a genre that shows people revealing themselves by how they react to the unexpected and this one is funny and sad and loaded with charm.

The plot line is simple: a beautiful lawyer loses her phone and a caller offers to return it if she will dine with him. Freshly divorced Diane (Virginie Efira) is trying to move on and is vulnerable to the smooth-talking Alexandre (Jean Dujardin). When they first meet she is stunned to find that the high-profile architect is 4 foot 6 inches tall. It is a hilarious scene of studied avoidance and shifting glances. But they hit it off and start dating, and each situation into which Diane introduces Alexandre is a farcical study of how people react to his diminutive stature. Throughout it all, Alexandre endures the stares and jibes with good-humoured acceptance despite the callous insensitivity of people towards those who are different.

There is an unmistakable feeling of guilt in laughing at how Alexandre copes with everyday moments in his life, like needing to jump up into a normal size chair and see his dangling feet not reach the floor. But that is the whole point: how would we react in the situation? Dujardin is a pin-up star of French cinema and he plays here with irrepressible warmth and forbearance despite his short straw in life. Efira is his perfect match and plays middle-class embarrassment to perfection. Critics have complained that the digital effects to down-size Dujardin are clumsy. It is true that if you look for it, you can notice some between-scene differences in scale and perspective that slightly alters his size in relation to the frame. Just ignore it. The whole of cinema involves suspension of disbelief and this story has more than enough going for it to be spoilt by minor hiccups with experimental technology.

Love stories between mismatched souls have always been the lifeblood of romantic comedy, so in one sense Up For Love is just another take on an ancient theme. If your glass is always half empty, then this film is a flawed cliché. For others, it is a delightful romance that doubles as a serious essay on dealing with difference. It is heart-warming and awkward, original and familiar, all at the same time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-05-04","keywords":"lawyer,remake,hit by a car,cyclist,art gallery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4117805593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkyYmQ1OTAtYjJmMi00M2UxLTgwMjktYWQ5ZDQ2YjVlZTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkyYmQ1OTAtYjJmMi00M2UxLTgwMjktYWQ5ZDQ2YjVlZTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0241121/","name":"Jean Dujardin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1812637/","name":"Virginie Efira"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0434806/","name":"Cédric Kahn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1016687/","name":"Laurent Tirard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0538675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172053/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069340/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138759/","name":"Marcos Carnevale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1016687/","name":"Laurent Tirard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897065/","name":"Grégoire Vigneron"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 4699388, Title: Un homme à la hauteur, --- Description: Un homme à la hauteur: Directed by Laurent Tirard. With Jean Dujardin, Virginie Efira, Cédric Kahn, Stéphanie Papanian. A lawyer dating a dashing, wealthy architect four and a half feet tall gets ribbed by her family, employees and jealous ex about his stature." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4699388/","name":"Un homme à la hauteur","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGNkYjQ2NDctZmI0YS00NTk2LTlmOWUtZmIxZTBjMWJlOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDA2NTMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A lawyer dating a dashing, wealthy architect four and a half feet tall gets ribbed by her family, employees and jealous ex about his stature.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4699388/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CineMuseFilms","dateCreated":"2016-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A delightful French farce that is funny and sad and loaded with charm.","reviewBody":"You'll search far and wide to find a positive review of this film but you have found one here. Like every romantic farce, Up For Love (2016) is a comedy based on situational humour rather than dialogue or action. It's a genre that shows people revealing themselves by how they react to the unexpected and this one is funny and sad and loaded with charm.

The plot line is simple: a beautiful lawyer loses her phone and a caller offers to return it if she will dine with him. Freshly divorced Diane (Virginie Efira) is trying to move on and is vulnerable to the smooth-talking Alexandre (Jean Dujardin). When they first meet she is stunned to find that the high-profile architect is 4 foot 6 inches tall. It is a hilarious scene of studied avoidance and shifting glances. But they hit it off and start dating, and each situation into which Diane introduces Alexandre is a farcical study of how people react to his diminutive stature. Throughout it all, Alexandre endures the stares and jibes with good-humoured acceptance despite the callous insensitivity of people towards those who are different.

There is an unmistakable feeling of guilt in laughing at how Alexandre copes with everyday moments in his life, like needing to jump up into a normal size chair and see his dangling feet not reach the floor. But that is the whole point: how would we react in the situation? Dujardin is a pin-up star of French cinema and he plays here with irrepressible warmth and forbearance despite his short straw in life. Efira is his perfect match and plays middle-class embarrassment to perfection. Critics have complained that the digital effects to down-size Dujardin are clumsy. It is true that if you look for it, you can notice some between-scene differences in scale and perspective that slightly alters his size in relation to the frame. Just ignore it. The whole of cinema involves suspension of disbelief and this story has more than enough going for it to be spoilt by minor hiccups with experimental technology.

Love stories between mismatched souls have always been the lifeblood of romantic comedy, so in one sense Up For Love is just another take on an ancient theme. If your glass is always half empty, then this film is a flawed cliché. For others, it is a delightful romance that doubles as a serious essay on dealing with difference. It is heart-warming and awkward, original and familiar, all at the same time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-05-04","keywords":"lawyer,remake,hit by a car,cyclist,art gallery","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4117805593","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkyYmQ1OTAtYjJmMi00M2UxLTgwMjktYWQ5ZDQ2YjVlZTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkyYmQ1OTAtYjJmMi00M2UxLTgwMjktYWQ5ZDQ2YjVlZTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0241121/","name":"Jean Dujardin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1812637/","name":"Virginie Efira","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0434806/","name":"Cédric Kahn"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1016687/","name":"Laurent Tirard"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0538675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172053/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069340/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0138759/","name":"Marcos Carnevale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1016687/","name":"Laurent Tirard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897065/","name":"Grégoire Vigneron"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: L'instinct de mort
Državni neprijatelj br.1
programme.desc:
L'instinct de mort: Directed by Jean-François Richet. With Vincent Cassel, Cécile de France, Gérard Depardieu, Gilles Lellouche. The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1259014/","name":"L'instinct de mort","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZhNWEwMDAtYzEyOC00NTVkLTgxZDktYjQwMDJiYjk2NmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAwMTU1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1259014/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wvisser-leusden"},"dateCreated":"2009-12-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"a good blockbuster of a famous French criminal","reviewBody":"Jacques Mesrine (1936 - 1979) was a well-known French criminal, getting himself a name for robbing banks and a number of murders. After having received a huge ransom for kidnapping a French millionaire in 1979, French authorities declared him 'Public Enemy Number One'. They increased their efforts to track Mesrine down, and executed him without a trial shortly afterwards. While imprisoned earlier on, Mesrine wrote his autobiography.

'Public Enemy Number One - Part 1' reflects the first part of this criminal's adult life. Starting in the late fifties in Algeria, where French soldier Jacques Mesrine served in the foul war of independence, we get a clear picture of his development as a master-criminal.

Although I think it difficult to judge the historical precision of its plot, this very French film surely makes a good watch. Male lead Vincent Cassel acts a convincing Jacques Mesrine, and the many supporting roles shine with equal quality. The parts 1 and 2 of 'Public enemy Number One' provide a real blockbuster that sticks to the mind.

For the fans of Ludivine Sagnier. She isn't in this Part 1, but will appear in Part 2.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33257,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Biography","Crime"],"datePublished":"2008-10-22","keywords":"mesrine,gangster,prison,prison escape,1960s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mesrine: Killer Instinct -- U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012298265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5OTg1ODgwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQyNjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5OTg1ODgwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQyNjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy NÂ°1."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001993/","name":"Vincent Cassel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0208426/","name":"Cécile de France"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724938/","name":"Jean-François Richet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097650/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0229884/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1626500/","name":"Jacques Mesrine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022382/","name":"Abdel Raouf Dafri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724938/","name":"Jean-François Richet"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Life Partners
Životni partneri
programme.desc:
Life Partners: Directed by Susanna Fogel. With Leighton Meester, Gillian Jacobs, Gabourey Sidibe, Beth Dover. Sasha and Paige's co-dependent friendship is tested as Paige gets serious with a guy for the first time." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2870808/","name":"Life Partners","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzEwMmYzMDMtODE1NC00YTMzLTgzNjUtN2Y2YzQ5MGNjZmI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzMwOTU5MDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sasha and Paige's co-dependent friendship is tested as Paige gets serious with a guy for the first time.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2870808/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Julesecosse"},"dateCreated":"2015-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Undecided","reviewBody":"I am not too sure whether I like this movie or not. It doesn't grab me, but on the other hand it's not too awful.

I enjoyed it to a point. It's a light hearted friendship comedy. I thought that the dialogue was excellent, on point, intelligent and well thought out; but I don't believe that the story went anywhere, it was a bit meandering, somewhat like this review!. I didn't think too much of the acting ability of the leads, but the supporting cast was uniformly excellent.

programme.desc:
L'instinct de mort: Directed by Jean-François Richet. With Vincent Cassel, Cécile de France, Gérard Depardieu, Gilles Lellouche. The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1259014/","name":"L'instinct de mort","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZhNWEwMDAtYzEyOC00NTVkLTgxZDktYjQwMDJiYjk2NmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAwMTU1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1259014/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wvisser-leusden"},"dateCreated":"2009-12-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"a good blockbuster of a famous French criminal","reviewBody":"Jacques Mesrine (1936 - 1979) was a well-known French criminal, getting himself a name for robbing banks and a number of murders. After having received a huge ransom for kidnapping a French millionaire in 1979, French authorities declared him 'Public Enemy Number One'. They increased their efforts to track Mesrine down, and executed him without a trial shortly afterwards. While imprisoned earlier on, Mesrine wrote his autobiography.

'Public Enemy Number One - Part 1' reflects the first part of this criminal's adult life. Starting in the late fifties in Algeria, where French soldier Jacques Mesrine served in the foul war of independence, we get a clear picture of his development as a master-criminal.

Although I think it difficult to judge the historical precision of its plot, this very French film surely makes a good watch. Male lead Vincent Cassel acts a convincing Jacques Mesrine, and the many supporting roles shine with equal quality. The parts 1 and 2 of 'Public enemy Number One' provide a real blockbuster that sticks to the mind.

For the fans of Ludivine Sagnier. She isn't in this Part 1, but will appear in Part 2.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33257,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Biography","Crime"],"datePublished":"2008-10-22","keywords":"mesrine,gangster,prison,prison escape,1960s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mesrine: Killer Instinct -- U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012298265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5OTg1ODgwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQyNjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5OTg1ODgwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQyNjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy NÂ°1."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001993/","name":"Vincent Cassel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0208426/","name":"Cécile de France"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724938/","name":"Jean-François Richet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097650/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0229884/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1626500/","name":"Jacques Mesrine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022382/","name":"Abdel Raouf Dafri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724938/","name":"Jean-François Richet"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

I enjoyed it to a point. It's a light hearted friendship comedy. I thought that the dialogue was excellent, on point, intelligent and well thought out; but I don't believe that the story went anywhere, it was a bit meandering, somewhat like this review!. I didn't think too much of the acting ability of the leads, but the supporting cast was uniformly excellent.

I would still recommend it to men and women alike, but not as a priority must see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8667,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2014-11-06","keywords":"lesbian,reference to ellen page,title written by female,21st century,timeframe 21st century","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi568504089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjUwODc2MzU2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE1OTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjUwODc2MzU2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE1OTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"At 29, the most long-term relationship Sasha and Paige have ever been in is with each other, using their co-dependent friendship as an excuse not to venture out into the dating world alone. programme.title: L'instinct de mort
Državni neprijatelj br.1 (Drugi dio)
programme.desc:
L'instinct de mort: Directed by Jean-François Richet. With Vincent Cassel, Cécile de France, Gérard Depardieu, Gilles Lellouche. The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1259014/","name":"L'instinct de mort","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZhNWEwMDAtYzEyOC00NTVkLTgxZDktYjQwMDJiYjk2NmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAwMTU1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of the notorious French gangster Jacques Mesrine, with the focus on his life before the early 1970s and the events that led to him being declared Public Enemy No. 1 in France.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1259014/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wvisser-leusden"},"dateCreated":"2009-12-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"a good blockbuster of a famous French criminal","reviewBody":"Jacques Mesrine (1936 - 1979) was a well-known French criminal, getting himself a name for robbing banks and a number of murders. After having received a huge ransom for kidnapping a French millionaire in 1979, French authorities declared him 'Public Enemy Number One'. They increased their efforts to track Mesrine down, and executed him without a trial shortly afterwards. While imprisoned earlier on, Mesrine wrote his autobiography.

'Public Enemy Number One - Part 1' reflects the first part of this criminal's adult life. Starting in the late fifties in Algeria, where French soldier Jacques Mesrine served in the foul war of independence, we get a clear picture of his development as a master-criminal.

Although I think it difficult to judge the historical precision of its plot, this very French film surely makes a good watch. Male lead Vincent Cassel acts a convincing Jacques Mesrine, and the many supporting roles shine with equal quality. The parts 1 and 2 of 'Public enemy Number One' provide a real blockbuster that sticks to the mind.

For the fans of Ludivine Sagnier. She isn't in this Part 1, but will appear in Part 2.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33257,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Biography","Crime"],"datePublished":"2008-10-22","keywords":"mesrine,gangster,prison,prison escape,1960s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mesrine: Killer Instinct -- U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012298265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5OTg1ODgwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQyNjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5OTg1ODgwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQyNjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of french gangster Jacques Mesrine, before he was called Public Enemy NÂ°1."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001993/","name":"Vincent Cassel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0208426/","name":"Cécile de France"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724938/","name":"Jean-François Richet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097650/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0229884/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1626500/","name":"Jacques Mesrine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022382/","name":"Abdel Raouf Dafri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724938/","name":"Jean-François Richet"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Emperor's New Clothes
Carevo novo ruho
programme.desc:
The Emperor's New Clothes: Directed by Michael Winterbottom. With Russell Brand, Geraint Anderson, Brigitte Bardot, Jean-Paul Belmondo. A look at the growing disparity between different economic classes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4323536/","name":"The Emperor's New Clothes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQwNTM4NTA2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczMTgyNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the growing disparity between different economic classes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4323536/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"imdb-487-881561"},"dateCreated":"2015-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"The children were impressed...","reviewBody":"After watching this documentary, the children were impressed so I asked them to reach for their mobile phones and google "how many phones are in the world". They know no other phones than mobile phones and no better source than Wikipedia. Probably, neither do you.

Wikipedia told them that there are approximately over 6,800,000,000 mobile phones in use for a global population of 7,012,000,000. They also delighted themselves by looking up the breakdown by country etc. Please also do so yourself.

Thirty, forty years ago no one could have thought that by today each person would have their own private phone line, much less in their pocket, and to boot, not just a phone but a computer.

Yet the poor are getting poorer, we are told.

I wonder what this documentary would have been like if instead of wealth, Russell Brand had had knowledge or commonsense. We will never find out."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1353,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2015-04-24","keywords":"economics,social justice,bank bail out,financial district,archive footage","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Emperor's New Clothes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1640608281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1YjYwNjUtNDQxNS00NmE2LTk4ZjMtMTZlODZlOGYyMGE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ1YjYwNjUtNDQxNS00NmE2LTk4ZjMtMTZlODZlOGYyMGE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Emperor's New Clothes"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1258970/","name":"Russell Brand"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4683116/","name":"Geraint Anderson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000003/","name":"Brigitte Bardot"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103733/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1258970/","name":"Russell Brand"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kinsey
Kinsey
programme.desc:
Kinsey: Directed by Bill Condon. With Liam Neeson, Laura Linney, Chris O'Donnell, Peter Sarsgaard. A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0362269/","name":"Kinsey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0MjA1MjA4MDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQxMDQ2MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0362269/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"seaview1"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kinsey enlightens a controversial subject","reviewBody":"Writer/Director Bill Condon does a thoroughly detailed, fascinating study of the life of famed sex researcher Alfred Kinsey in the drama, Kinsey. What would on surface seem unfilmable is done with great sensitivity and honesty.

Condon knows how to tell stories about real people (Gods and Monsters), and here is a life filled with curiosity and far reaching accomplishment.

Raised in a repressed family dominated by a stern father, Kinsey is portrayed as an isolated teen who rebels against not only his father, but against sexual convention. As a science instructor in college, he meets a student who becomes his wife. As other students look more and more to him for sexual advice, his original interest in insect studies changes to sex adviser and ultimately sex researcher. His team of assistants and even their wives become involved in the research. As Kinsey's study requires sample interviews across the country, a diverse, amazing discovery of sexual habits and statistics are revealed. The study ultimately becomes published in a groundbreaking best seller amid a swell of damnation from the public.

Condon interweaves the science with the human element in a very intelligent screenplay. It is remarkable that such a coherent storyline emerges from a multitude of scientific and news sources. The movie also says a lot about the state of the country at a time in mid twentieth century America when the Red Scare was in full swing and the populace was guided by the morals and sensibilities of its time. Kinsey's relationship with his wife is the thread that ties the film together thematically. She essentially becomes the barometer for his work and his shortcomings. Here is a man who was brilliant and at the same time fallible.

There is no epilogue at film's end as might be expected for a biography, but it is a nice touch for a film that tries to approach its subject with freshness and reverence. The set design and costumes are all authentic in period flavor, but the film seems to be focused not on marking the precise year but depicting an era or time. Do stay for the amusing end credits which show a veritable Noah's Ark of animals in their glory. 

Liam Neeson is very good as the obsessed scientist who tries to conduct meaningful, quantifiable research while reconciling the emotional toll on his marriage and his friendships. Laura Linney is in fine form as the supportive wife who observes and then participates in her husband's venture.

As his research assistants, Timothy Hutton, Chris O'Donnell, and Peter Sarsgaard round out a very strong ensemble cast. In fact, these fine actors are almost wasted in supporting roles. John Lithgow is pitch perfect as Kinsey's cruel, insensitive father. There is a nice, near cameo appearance by Lynn Redgrave (Gods and Monsters) as the last interview of Kinsey, and she resonates in her brief appearance.

In keeping with the subject matter, there is graphic dialogue and sexual depictions, but there is nothing exploitive or without narrative purpose here. It is interesting to note that this film is coming on the heels of a moralistic backlash of media content and permissiveness. By showing how well-intended human studies into formerly taboo subjects helped to enlighten and reexamine human behavior, Kinsey proves to be the right film for the right time."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48675,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-01-07","keywords":"sexuality,character name as title,surname as title,lgbt plus,timeframe 1940s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kinsey","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2224292121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjMyNjcwODktYjI3MC00ODVmLTlkOTktMmI5NDYyNzVhYjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjMyNjcwODktYjI3MC00ODVmLTlkOTktMmI5NDYyNzVhYjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001473/","name":"Laura Linney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174374/","name":"Bill Condon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102795/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0107069/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174374/","name":"Bill Condon"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0362269, Title: Kinsey, --- Description: Kinsey: Directed by Bill Condon. With Liam Neeson, Laura Linney, Chris O'Donnell, Peter Sarsgaard. A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0362269/","name":"Kinsey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0MjA1MjA4MDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDQxMDQ2MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0362269/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"seaview1","dateCreated":"2004-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Kinsey enlightens a controversial subject","reviewBody":"Writer/Director Bill Condon does a thoroughly detailed, fascinating study of the life of famed sex researcher Alfred Kinsey in the drama, Kinsey. What would on surface seem unfilmable is done with great sensitivity and honesty.

Condon knows how to tell stories about real people (Gods and Monsters), and here is a life filled with curiosity and far reaching accomplishment.

Raised in a repressed family dominated by a stern father, Kinsey is portrayed as an isolated teen who rebels against not only his father, but against sexual convention. As a science instructor in college, he meets a student who becomes his wife. As other students look more and more to him for sexual advice, his original interest in insect studies changes to sex adviser and ultimately sex researcher. His team of assistants and even their wives become involved in the research. As Kinsey's study requires sample interviews across the country, a diverse, amazing discovery of sexual habits and statistics are revealed. The study ultimately becomes published in a groundbreaking best seller amid a swell of damnation from the public.

Condon interweaves the science with the human element in a very intelligent screenplay. It is remarkable that such a coherent storyline emerges from a multitude of scientific and news sources. The movie also says a lot about the state of the country at a time in mid twentieth century America when the Red Scare was in full swing and the populace was guided by the morals and sensibilities of its time. Kinsey's relationship with his wife is the thread that ties the film together thematically. She essentially becomes the barometer for his work and his shortcomings. Here is a man who was brilliant and at the same time fallible.

There is no epilogue at film's end as might be expected for a biography, but it is a nice touch for a film that tries to approach its subject with freshness and reverence. The set design and costumes are all authentic in period flavor, but the film seems to be focused not on marking the precise year but depicting an era or time. Do stay for the amusing end credits which show a veritable Noah's Ark of animals in their glory. 

Liam Neeson is very good as the obsessed scientist who tries to conduct meaningful, quantifiable research while reconciling the emotional toll on his marriage and his friendships. Laura Linney is in fine form as the supportive wife who observes and then participates in her husband's venture.

As his research assistants, Timothy Hutton, Chris O'Donnell, and Peter Sarsgaard round out a very strong ensemble cast. In fact, these fine actors are almost wasted in supporting roles. John Lithgow is pitch perfect as Kinsey's cruel, insensitive father. There is a nice, near cameo appearance by Lynn Redgrave (Gods and Monsters) as the last interview of Kinsey, and she resonates in her brief appearance.

In keeping with the subject matter, there is graphic dialogue and sexual depictions, but there is nothing exploitive or without narrative purpose here. It is interesting to note that this film is coming on the heels of a moralistic backlash of media content and permissiveness. By showing how well-intended human studies into formerly taboo subjects helped to enlighten and reexamine human behavior, Kinsey proves to be the right film for the right time.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48675,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-01-07","keywords":"sexuality,character name as title,surname as title,lgbt plus,timeframe 1940s","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kinsey","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2224292121","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjMyNjcwODktYjI3MC00ODVmLTlkOTktMmI5NDYyNzVhYjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjMyNjcwODktYjI3MC00ODVmLTlkOTktMmI5NDYyNzVhYjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001473/","name":"Laura Linney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000563/","name":"Chris O'Donnell"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174374/","name":"Bill Condon"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028932/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102795/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0107069/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174374/","name":"Bill Condon"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winchester
Kuća duhova
programme.desc: Winchester: Directed by Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig. With Helen Mirren, Sarah Snook, Finn Scicluna-O'Prey, Jason Clarke. Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1072748/","name":"Winchester","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2OWE5OGItMTE4Yi00ZmIzLThjZDctNTU1OTMxMTc3Yjg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjM4NTM5NDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1072748/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ehzimmerman"},"dateCreated":"2018-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly cathartic","reviewBody":"For those who want factual history, "Captive of the Labyrinth" by Mary Jo Ignoffo is an excellent biography of Sarah Winchester, who probably was not interested in ghosts, but rather in architecture, a field that did not invite professional participation by women. Sarah Winchester's father manufactured decorative architectural features for Victorian houses, and his factory was right next door to her childhood home -- so Sarah grew up intimately exposed to the physical details of building houses. As an educated rich woman, building her house was an expensive hobby she loved and could afford to pursue. She also incorporated the newest technology - elevators, showers, etc. - into the house, and managed a productive fruit orchards and a dried fruit business, and . I thought the movie did a good job of including some factual information based on the real Sarah Winchester, and accurately portrayed her as responsible, not crazy, and deeply caring for her family, As for the lurid sensational haunted house story, this was concocted by those who bought the house after Sarah Winchester died, and turned it into a money-making tourist trap. That said, I enjoyed this fictional ghost story, which explored deeper themes than I would normally expect from a supernatural horror genre flick. There does seem to be a heavy handed message about gun violence -- however, I agree with that message; it's more than timely..","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32994,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2018-02-02","keywords":"ghost,winchester house,widower,gothic horror,haunted house","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Tease","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2287974681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MDA2NjE3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjEyMDEwNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On an isolated stretch of land 50 miles outside of San Francisco sits the most haunted house in the world. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it is a house that knows no end. Constructed in an incessant twenty-four hour a day, seven day a week mania for decades, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To the outsider it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah is not building for herself, for her niece or for the brilliant Doctor Eric Price whom she has summoned to the house. She is building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts, and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters..."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3512758/","name":"Sarah Snook"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7073477/","name":"Finn Scicluna-O'Prey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294961/","name":"Michael Spierig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294962/","name":"Peter Spierig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0380601/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0215453/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1129343/","name":"Tom Vaughan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294961/","name":"Michael Spierig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1294962/","name":"Peter Spierig"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chasing Mavericks
Surferi
programme.desc:
Chasing Mavericks: Directed by Michael Apted, Curtis Hanson. With Gerard Butler, Jonny Weston, Elisabeth Shue, Abigail Spencer. When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1629757/","name":"Chasing Mavericks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc5MTU5MTk2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzg3NjcxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1629757/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sanwelch2004"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie! Both thrilling and a life story.","reviewBody":"This movie was great - The filming of of the huge waves, surfers, and conditions was fantastic. I found it a beautiful story of people, the challenge of relationships, mixed with the thrill of surfing, and the athletic abilities required for the champions.

From the heart, this is a true story of a young man, Jay (Jonny Weston), who in spite of many things against him, manages to make his dream come true based on hard work. It is also the story of another man, Frosty (Gerard Butler,) who has his own personal challenges, comes to terms with some of those, and builds a relationship with a young man who needs a father. I was particularly impressed by Brenda (Abigail Spencer), Frosty's wife, who simply loved him. Maybe a strange statement, but when you see the film, you will understand.

Definitely worth seeing!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32170,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2012-10-26","keywords":"younger version of character,time jump,mentor protege relationship,writing an essay,father son estrangement","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3341722905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDA5NjU1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDA1MTQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDA5NjU1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDA1MTQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When 15-year-old Jay Moriarty discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, is not only real, but exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4103976/","name":"Jonny Weston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000223/","name":"Elisabeth Shue"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000776/","name":"Michael Apted"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000436/","name":"Curtis Hanson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758002/","name":"Kario Salem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2249435/","name":"Jim Meenaghan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0393714/","name":"Brandon Hooper"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

It is also the story of another man, Frosty (Gerard Butler,) who has his own personal challenges, comes to terms with some of those, and builds a relationship with a young man who needs a father. I was particularly impressed by Brenda (Abigail Spencer), Frosty's wife, who simply loved him. Maybe a strange statement, but when you see the film, you will understand.

Definitely worth seeing!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32170,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Biography","Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2012-10-26","keywords":"younger version of character,time jump,mentor protege relationship,writing an essay,father son estrangement","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3341722905","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDA5NjU1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDA1MTQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0NDA5NjU1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDA1MTQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When 15-year-old Jay Moriarty discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, is not only real, but exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4103976/","name":"Jonny Weston","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000223/","name":"Elisabeth Shue"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000776/","name":"Michael Apted","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000436/","name":"Curtis Hanson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073388/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177687/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0758002/","name":"Kario Salem","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2249435/","name":"Jim Meenaghan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0393714/","name":"Brandon Hooper"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
Tajna podmornice K-19
programme.desc:
K-19: The Widowmaker: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. With Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings, Christian Camargo, Roman Podhora. When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0267626/","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY2YjIwNDAtYjQwOC00YjY5LTk2MDUtMjY4ZDdiMjdlNjIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0267626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DarthBill"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Widowmaker","reviewBody":"In an attempt to break from his usual sympathetic every man bit, Ford plays a blunt, powerful, hard working Russian Naval officer who is given command of a nuclear powered sub from its well liked, almost fatherly captain played by Liam Neeson. Harrison and Liam clash as only two strong willed alpha males can when they take the sub out for a spin and fight to keep it from blowing up and causing a world wide tragedy.

Based on a true story.

Ford and Neeson give solid performances to this long, murky, cold, and ultimately detached action drama that proved to be one of 2002's lesser box office endeavors. As stated before, the film suffers from a feeling of disconnection, even as numbers of brave men are sent into the nuclear reactor with improper protection ("They might as well be wearing rain coats!")

Could have been better, and it could have been a lot worse. Rent and judge for yourself. Probably mostly for fans of Ford and Neeson."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":62025,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-12-25","keywords":"radiation sickness,radioactive contamination,soviet union,submarine,nuclear submarine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153606425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for K-19: The Widowmaker"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819874/","name":"Sam Spruell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824220/","name":"Peter Stebbings"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000941/","name":"Kathryn Bigelow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019266/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637491/","name":"Louis Nowra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477370/","name":"Christopher Kyle"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Gentlemen
Gospoda
programme.desc:
The Gentlemen: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Matthew McConaughey, Charlie Hunnam, Michelle Dockery, Jeremy Strong. An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8367814/","name":"The Gentlemen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTlkMmVmYjktYTc2NC00ZGZjLWEyOWUtMjc2MDMwMjQwOTA5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MzE4MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8367814/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jtindahouse"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ritchie returns to the crime genre and does so masterfully","reviewBody":"Has there ever been a bad performance in a Guy Ritchie movie? If there has I haven't noticed it. He has an ornate ability to take average actors and make them great, and to take already great actors and get even more out of them. There are a few directors around who specialise in this but Ritchie is right near the top. The cast in 'The Gentlemen' is admittedly fantastic, but it doesn't change the fact that they are an absolute treat to watch. Matthew McConaughey is in his element in a role that he was born to play, Charlie Hunnam plays one of the coolest characters I've seen perfectly, Colin Farrell is hilarious and ridiculously cool as well and then Hugh Grant gives one of the best performances I've ever seen from him. In fact Grant was so good I didn't even recognise his voice and had to wonder if they'd dubbed it. They hadn't, he'd just nailed it.

The style this movie possesses is just so much fun to watch. If you've seen any of Ritchie's previous similar films ('Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels', 'Snatch', 'RocknRolla') then you know what I'm talking about. The pacing moves at lightning speed, the dialogue is quick, clever and deeper than you first realise and the conflict is always multi-layered. This one is actually told in quite a unique way with a couple of characters going over events that have already happened and it works masterfully. It breaks the story up and gives room for creativity in the story-telling process and also humour.

Every time I see that Ritchie has made a movie that isn't a crime-thriller I get a little disappointed. It's not that the other stuff he's doing is bad ('Swept Away' being an obvious exception), it's just that he is so damn good as this style of movie. He's the best in the business and if he only did these for the rest of his career I'd be a very happy man. This is an excellent movie well worth your time and money.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":290541,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2020-01-01","keywords":"british,marijuana farm,drugs,gangster,voice over narration","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3741564697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTAwYjNlNTQtMzE1OC00NjkxLWEzNGItNTg3OWIwMzFhYjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTAwYjNlNTQtMzE1OC00NjkxLWEzNGItNTg3OWIwMzFhYjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"American expat Mickey Pearson (Matthew McConaughey) has built a highly profitable marijuana empire in London. When word gets out that he's looking to cash out of the business forever it triggers plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0402271/","name":"Charlie Hunnam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890784/","name":"Michelle Dockery"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0699213/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131026/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6842463/","name":"Ivan Atkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3044095/","name":"Marn Davies"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

There are a few directors around who specialise in this but Ritchie is right near the top. The cast in 'The Gentlemen' is admittedly fantastic, but it doesn't change the fact that they are an absolute treat to watch. Matthew McConaughey is in his element in a role that he was born to play, Charlie Hunnam plays one of the coolest characters I've seen perfectly, Colin Farrell is hilarious and ridiculously cool as well and then Hugh Grant gives one of the best performances I've ever seen from him. programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
Tajna podmornice K-19
programme.desc:
K-19: The Widowmaker: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. With Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings, Christian Camargo, Roman Podhora. When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0267626/","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY2YjIwNDAtYjQwOC00YjY5LTk2MDUtMjY4ZDdiMjdlNjIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0267626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DarthBill"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Widowmaker","reviewBody":"In an attempt to break from his usual sympathetic every man bit, Ford plays a blunt, powerful, hard working Russian Naval officer who is given command of a nuclear powered sub from its well liked, almost fatherly captain played by Liam Neeson. Harrison and Liam clash as only two strong willed alpha males can when they take the sub out for a spin and fight to keep it from blowing up and causing a world wide tragedy.

Based on a true story.

Ford and Neeson give solid performances to this long, murky, cold, and ultimately detached action drama that proved to be one of 2002's lesser box office endeavors. As stated before, the film suffers from a feeling of disconnection, even as numbers of brave men are sent into the nuclear reactor with improper protection ("They might as well be wearing rain coats!")

Could have been better, and it could have been a lot worse. Rent and judge for yourself. Probably mostly for fans of Ford and Neeson."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":62025,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-12-25","keywords":"radiation sickness,radioactive contamination,soviet union,submarine,nuclear submarine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153606425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for K-19: The Widowmaker"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819874/","name":"Sam Spruell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824220/","name":"Peter Stebbings"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000941/","name":"Kathryn Bigelow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019266/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637491/","name":"Louis Nowra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477370/","name":"Christopher Kyle"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bosch
Bosch
programme.desc:
Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wandernn1-81-683274"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gotta Love The Hollywood Precinct!!!!","reviewBody":"I really love this show and am so glad Titus Welliver found a signature role for himself. He seems perfect to me for the role of Harry Bosch and the show itself is pretty damn good for a Cop show.

Great performances from the supporting cast as well really make this a fantastic show. As well as it being set in my home town of LA , where it's great to be able to see a lot of local landmarks as well as a spectacular recurring view of LA from Bosch's house.

Some seasons are better than others of course and now that we have a lot of seasons we can grade them all individually.

Season 5

8/10 Stars Was a little disappointed by the 'Walsh' character coming back in a desperate attempt for revenge. Seems a bit stolen from the 'Heat' movie where DeNiro just couldn't leave it alone, giving up his 100%chance to escape for some unnecessary vengeance on a character that would have absolutely no bearing at all on future 'business'. Of course I guess it does make for good closing action sequences. And in this case , additional added value to the DOG character.

Season 6

5/10 Stars This season was probably the worst one yet. No Crate and Barrel at all in the first 3 episodes. The Sovereigns plot line seemed a bit lame, especially at the end of the season and what happened there. And a very disappointing J. Edgar character arc with how he ends up this season. I wasn't impressed by this season. And really it had no impressive villains at all in it.

Season 7

6/10 Stars.. This final 8 episode season was disappointing as well. The conflict between Harry and J. Edgar was at least resolved in the end. It's just sad that the show is ending. I will miss it a lot.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60888,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-02-06","keywords":"father daughter relationship,homicide detective,police procedural,police detective,based on novel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920038/","name":"Titus Welliver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373100/","name":"Jamie Hector"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0032628/","name":"Amy Aquino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483993/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420833/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Watch the Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3258368025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU4MWFhMWYtMjdmNi00ZDNkLWI4NWMtNWJiNjBlYjFkMmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3502248, Title: Bosch, --- Description: Bosch: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer. With Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Lance Reddick. An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3502248/","name":"Bosch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBiYjg4OTgtZDg2YS00ZGIzLTk3ZWMtZWRlZDQ5M2I0MDNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An L.A.P.D. homicide detective works to solve the murder of a thirteen-year-old boy while standing trial in federal court for the murder of a serial killer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3502248/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"wandernn1-81-683274","dateCreated":"2020-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gotta Love The Hollywood Precinct!!!!","reviewBody":"I really love this show and am so glad Titus Welliver found a signature role for himself. He seems perfect to me for the role of Harry Bosch and the show itself is pretty damn good for a Cop show.

Great performances from the supporting cast as well really make this a fantastic show. As well as it being set in my home town of LA , where it's great to be able to see a lot of local landmarks as well as a spectacular recurring view of LA from Bosch's house.

Some seasons are better than others of course and now that we have a lot of seasons we can grade them all individually.

Season 5

8/10 Stars Was a little disappointed by the 'Walsh' character coming back in a desperate attempt for revenge. Seems a bit stolen from the 'Heat' movie where DeNiro just couldn't leave it alone, giving up his 100%chance to escape for some unnecessary vengeance on a character that would have absolutely no bearing at all on future 'business'. Of course I guess it does make for good closing action sequences. And in this case , additional added value to the DOG character.

Season 6

5/10 Stars This season was probably the worst one yet. No Crate and Barrel at all in the first 3 episodes. The Sovereigns plot line seemed a bit lame, especially at the end of the season and what happened there. And a very disappointing J. Edgar character arc with how he ends up this season. I wasn't impressed by this season. And really it had no impressive villains at all in it.
