programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
Otmica u metrou 123
programme.desc:
The Taking of Pelham 123: Directed by Tony Scott. With Denzel Washington, John Travolta, Luis Guzmán, Victor Gojcaj. Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1111422/","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3NzA4MDcwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDAyNzc1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1111422/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dglink"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pelham Offers Quite a Ride!","reviewBody":"The new Tony Scott movie gives one helluva ride, but don't sit and analyze the plot for credibility during the closing credits, this is not that kind of movie. Four sleazy thugs, who could be spotted as bad guys by a blind man, hijack a Lexington Avenue subway and take passengers as hostages. A ransom-for-hostages negotiation begins via radio between the driver's compartment on the train and the central control center for the New York City subway system. The premise is hardly new territory, and, for those who have seen the Walter-Matthau-Robert-Shaw version of the John Godey novel, the film is even less original.

However, for audiences that want a night out at the movies with a rousing action flick, "The Taking of Pelham 123" will fill the bill nicely. The editing is often frenetic, and the camera moves even during dialog-heavy scenes. The chases are fast paced, the car crashes are over the top, and the bloody scenes are properly bloody. While all of this is enough for some mindless entertainment, four excellent performances enhance the proceedings and make the film seem better than it is. John Travolta pulls out the stops as Ryder, the head hijacker, and, in his full wacko persona, steals his every scene. As the man on the other end of the phone, bespectacled Denzel Washington, dressed down in everyman frumpy, is quiet and assured, although nothing quite suggests that the character of Walter Garber will or could rise to his climactic actions. James Gandolfini plays the mayor with a sly sense of fun, and John Turturro is a hard-to-gauge hostage negotiator. "Pelham" is a man's movie, and the women are relegated to small, peripheral roles as wives, conductors, and hostages. How refreshing the film might have been if Scott had cast a female in one of the four main roles.

However, whatever the movie's flaws, and there are many, "The Taking of Pelham 123" does what it sets out to do: entertain and engage the audience for two hours. Don't expect more, and you won't be disappointed, and, in a summer movie, "Pelham's" assets are exactly what most of us are looking for anyway.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":193092,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-06-10","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,woman wears eyeglasses,train,hostage,subway","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1348535065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garbe (Washington) into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime (Travolta)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350079/","name":"Luis Guzmán"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323945/","name":"John Godey"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1111422, Title: The Taking of Pelham 123, --- Description: The Taking of Pelham 123: Directed by Tony Scott. With Denzel Washington, John Travolta, Luis Guzmán, Victor Gojcaj. Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1111422/","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3NzA4MDcwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDAyNzc1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garber into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1111422/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dglink","dateCreated":"2009-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pelham Offers Quite a Ride!","reviewBody":"The new Tony Scott movie gives one helluva ride, but don't sit and analyze the plot for credibility during the closing credits, this is not that kind of movie. Four sleazy thugs, who could be spotted as bad guys by a blind man, hijack a Lexington Avenue subway and take passengers as hostages. A ransom-for-hostages negotiation begins via radio between the driver's compartment on the train and the central control center for the New York City subway system. The premise is hardly new territory, and, for those who have seen the Walter-Matthau-Robert-Shaw version of the John Godey novel, the film is even less original.

However, for audiences that want a night out at the movies with a rousing action flick, "The Taking of Pelham 123" will fill the bill nicely. The editing is often frenetic, and the camera moves even during dialog-heavy scenes. The chases are fast paced, the car crashes are over the top, and the bloody scenes are properly bloody. While all of this is enough for some mindless entertainment, four excellent performances enhance the proceedings and make the film seem better than it is. John Travolta pulls out the stops as Ryder, the head hijacker, and, in his full wacko persona, steals his every scene. As the man on the other end of the phone, bespectacled Denzel Washington, dressed down in everyman frumpy, is quiet and assured, although nothing quite suggests that the character of Walter Garber will or could rise to his climactic actions. James Gandolfini plays the mayor with a sly sense of fun, and John Turturro is a hard-to-gauge hostage negotiator. "Pelham" is a man's movie, and the women are relegated to small, peripheral roles as wives, conductors, and hostages. How refreshing the film might have been if Scott had cast a female in one of the four main roles.

However, whatever the movie's flaws, and there are many, "The Taking of Pelham 123" does what it sets out to do: entertain and engage the audience for two hours. Don't expect more, and you won't be disappointed, and, in a summer movie, "Pelham's" assets are exactly what most of us are looking for anyway.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":193092,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-06-10","keywords":"man wears eyeglasses,woman wears eyeglasses,train,hostage,subway","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Taking of Pelham 123: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1348535065","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTQ4Mjc4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk4MTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for dispatcher Walter Garbe (Washington) into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime (Travolta).","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350079/","name":"Luis Guzmán"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323945/","name":"John Godey"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

programme.title: Mad Men
Momci s Madisona
programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"crewbie"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Start from the beginning - you wouldn't watch a foreign film without subtitles, would you?","reviewBody":"The brilliance is all in the subtext. There are many hilarious moments that are only funny if you've been paying attention and understand where the character is coming from. There are also many tragic moments that would pass you by if you didn't know what came before. Many lines have double or even triple meanings. Watch this from the beginning, with a friend. Believe me, you will want to discuss each episode afterward to figure out some of the nuances of what happened.

The main Mad Man is the confident womanizer Don Draper, who is head of the Creative department at a mid-sized ad agency in 1960s Madison Avenue. I admit, at first I kind of hated him, but as the viewer learns more about him and his past, I learned to - not love him exactly - but like him and want to watch him endlessly. He is a complicated character who can be a very good man, but also a very bad man.

Don Draper is joined by a rich cast of supporting characters, many of whom deserve a show of their own: The ambitious young Campbell who is utterly sleazy most of the time, but has occasional moments of growth and even cuteness.Peggy Olson starts out as Draper's secretary, but her growth into a strong, confident woman mirrors what is happening for Woman in the 60's. Silver fox Stirling - he may be morally bankrupt but gets some of the best lines. I could go on . . .

The 60's clothes, hairstyles, decor, and current events provide an interesting backdrop for what is essentially a character piece. The setting provides both the occasional laugh (cigarettes being advertised as "healthy") and the more than occasional cringe (how could dumping trash from a picnic in the park right on the grass ever seem okay?!).

If you need fast-paced action or a laugh track, this definitely isn't the show for you. But, if you like character development and subtlety in your television shows, rent the first seasons on DVD and settle in. You won't regret it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

There are many hilarious moments that are only funny if you've been paying attention and understand where the character is coming from. There are also many tragic moments that would pass you by if you didn't know what came before. Many lines have double or even triple meanings. Watch this from the beginning, with a friend. Believe me, you will want to discuss each episode afterward to figure out some of the nuances of what happened.

The main Mad Man is the confident womanizer Don Draper, who is head of the Creative department at a mid-sized ad agency in 1960s Madison Avenue. I admit, at first I kind of hated him, but as the viewer learns more about him and his past, I learned to - not love him exactly - but like him and want to watch him endlessly. He is a complicated character who can be a very good man, but also a very bad man.

Don Draper is joined by a rich cast of supporting characters, many of whom deserve a show of their own: The ambitious young Campbell who is utterly sleazy most of the time, but has occasional moments of growth and even cuteness.Peggy Olson starts out as Draper's secretary, but her growth into a strong, confident woman mirrors what is happening for Woman in the 60's. Silver fox Stirling - he may be morally bankrupt but gets some of the best lines. I could go on . . .

The 60's clothes, hairstyles, decor, and current events provide an interesting backdrop for what is essentially a character piece. The setting provides both the occasional laugh (cigarettes being advertised as "healthy") and the more than occasional cringe (how could dumping trash from a picnic in the park right on the grass ever seem okay?!).

If you need fast-paced action or a laugh track, this definitely isn't the show for you. But, if you like character development and subtlety in your television shows, rent the first seasons on DVD and settle in. You won't regret it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Mr. Mercedes
programme.desc: Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati. Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

I admit, at first I kind of hated him, but as the viewer learns more about him and his past, I learned to - not love him exactly - but like him and want to watch him endlessly. He is a complicated character who can be a very good man, but also a very bad man.

Don Draper is joined by a rich cast of supporting characters, many of whom deserve a show of their own: The ambitious young Campbell who is utterly sleazy most of the time, but has occasional moments of growth and even cuteness.Peggy Olson starts out as Draper's secretary, but her growth into a strong, confident woman mirrors what is happening for Woman in the 60's. Silver fox Stirling - he may be morally bankrupt but gets some of the best lines. I could go on . . .

The 60's clothes, hairstyles, decor, and current events provide an interesting backdrop for what is essentially a character piece. The setting provides both the occasional laugh (cigarettes being advertised as "healthy") and the more than occasional cringe (how could dumping trash from a picnic in the park right on the grass ever seem okay?!).

If you need fast-paced action or a laugh track, this definitely isn't the show for you. But, if you like character development and subtlety in your television shows, rent the first seasons on DVD and settle in. You won't regret it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""</script><metacontent="

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Mr. Mercedes
programme.desc: Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati. Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Mad Men
Momci s Madisona
programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"crewbie"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Start from the beginning - you wouldn't watch a foreign film without subtitles, would you?","reviewBody":"The brilliance is all in the subtext. There are many hilarious moments that are only funny if you've been paying attention and understand where the character is coming from. There are also many tragic moments that would pass you by if you didn't know what came before. Many lines have double or even triple meanings. Watch this from the beginning, with a friend. Believe me, you will want to discuss each episode afterward to figure out some of the nuances of what happened.

The main Mad Man is the confident womanizer Don Draper, who is head of the Creative department at a mid-sized ad agency in 1960s Madison Avenue. I admit, at first I kind of hated him, but as the viewer learns more about him and his past, I learned to - not love him exactly - but like him and want to watch him endlessly. He is a complicated character who can be a very good man, but also a very bad man.

Don Draper is joined by a rich cast of supporting characters, many of whom deserve a show of their own: The ambitious young Campbell who is utterly sleazy most of the time, but has occasional moments of growth and even cuteness.Peggy Olson starts out as Draper's secretary, but her growth into a strong, confident woman mirrors what is happening for Woman in the 60's. Silver fox Stirling - he may be morally bankrupt but gets some of the best lines. I could go on . . .

The 60's clothes, hairstyles, decor, and current events provide an interesting backdrop for what is essentially a character piece. The setting provides both the occasional laugh (cigarettes being advertised as "healthy") and the more than occasional cringe (how could dumping trash from a picnic in the park right on the grass ever seem okay?!).

If you need fast-paced action or a laugh track, this definitely isn't the show for you. But, if you like character development and subtlety in your television shows, rent the first seasons on DVD and settle in. You won't regret it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"crewbie","dateCreated":"2009-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Start from the beginning - you wouldn't watch a foreign film without subtitles, would you?","reviewBody":"The brilliance is all in the subtext. There are many hilarious moments that are only funny if you've been paying attention and understand where the character is coming from. There are also many tragic moments that would pass you by if you didn't know what came before. Many lines have double or even triple meanings. Watch this from the beginning, with a friend. Believe me, you will want to discuss each episode afterward to figure out some of the nuances of what happened.

The main Mad Man is the confident womanizer Don Draper, who is head of the Creative department at a mid-sized ad agency in 1960s Madison Avenue. I admit, at first I kind of hated him, but as the viewer learns more about him and his past, I learned to - not love him exactly - but like him and want to watch him endlessly. He is a complicated character who can be a very good man, but also a very bad man.

Don Draper is joined by a rich cast of supporting characters, many of whom deserve a show of their own: The ambitious young Campbell who is utterly sleazy most of the time, but has occasional moments of growth and even cuteness.Peggy Olson starts out as Draper's secretary, but her growth into a strong, confident woman mirrors what is happening for Woman in the 60's. Silver fox Stirling - he may be morally bankrupt but gets some of the best lines. I could go on . . .

The 60's clothes, hairstyles, decor, and current events provide an interesting backdrop for what is essentially a character piece. The setting provides both the occasional laugh (cigarettes being advertised as "healthy") and the more than occasional cringe (how could dumping trash from a picnic in the park right on the grass ever seem okay?!).

If you need fast-paced action or a laugh track, this definitely isn't the show for you. But, if you like character development and subtlety in your television shows, rent the first seasons on DVD and settle in. You won't regret it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Mr. Mercedes
programme.desc: Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati. Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Mad Men
Momci s Madisona
programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"crewbie"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Start from the beginning - you wouldn't watch a foreign film without subtitles, would you?","reviewBody":"The brilliance is all in the subtext. There are many hilarious moments that are only funny if you've been paying attention and understand where the character is coming from. There are also many tragic moments that would pass you by if you didn't know what came before. Many lines have double or even triple meanings. Watch this from the beginning, with a friend. Believe me, you will want to discuss each episode afterward to figure out some of the nuances of what happened.

The main Mad Man is the confident womanizer Don Draper, who is head of the Creative department at a mid-sized ad agency in 1960s Madison Avenue. I admit, at first I kind of hated him, but as the viewer learns more about him and his past, I learned to - not love him exactly - but like him and want to watch him endlessly. He is a complicated character who can be a very good man, but also a very bad man.

Don Draper is joined by a rich cast of supporting characters, many of whom deserve a show of their own: The ambitious young Campbell who is utterly sleazy most of the time, but has occasional moments of growth and even cuteness.Peggy Olson starts out as Draper's secretary, but her growth into a strong, confident woman mirrors what is happening for Woman in the 60's. Silver fox Stirling - he may be morally bankrupt but gets some of the best lines. I could go on . . .

The 60's clothes, hairstyles, decor, and current events provide an interesting backdrop for what is essentially a character piece. The setting provides both the occasional laugh (cigarettes being advertised as "healthy") and the more than occasional cringe (how could dumping trash from a picnic in the park right on the grass ever seem okay?!).

If you need fast-paced action or a laugh track, this definitely isn't the show for you. But, if you like character development and subtlety in your television shows, rent the first seasons on DVD and settle in. credits.actor: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones, Christina Hendricks, Michael Gladis, Rosemarie DeWitt, Talia Balsam

programme.category: Drama, Drama
programme.review: --- Actors: Jon Hamm (role=Don Draper), Elisabeth Moss (role=Peggy Olson), Vincent Kartheiser (role=Pete Campbell), January Jones (role=Betty Francis), Christina Hendricks (role=Joan Harris), Aaron Staton (role=Ken Cosgrove), Rich Sommer (role=Harry Crane), John Slattery (role=Roger Sterling), Kiernan Shipka (role=Sally Draper), Robert Morse (role=Bertram Cooper), Christopher Stanley (role=Henry Francis), Jessica Paré (role=Megan Draper)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0804503, Title: Mad Men, --- Description: Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"crewbie","dateCreated":"2009-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Start from the beginning - you wouldn't watch a foreign film without subtitles, would you?","reviewBody":"The brilliance is all in the subtext. There are many hilarious moments that are only funny if you've been paying attention and understand where the character is coming from. There are also many tragic moments that would pass you by if you didn't know what came before. Many lines have double or even triple meanings. Watch this from the beginning, with a friend. Believe me, you will want to discuss each episode afterward to figure out some of the nuances of what happened.

The main Mad Man is the confident womanizer Don Draper, who is head of the Creative department at a mid-sized ad agency in 1960s Madison Avenue. I admit, at first I kind of hated him, but as the viewer learns more about him and his past, I learned to - not love him exactly - but like him and want to watch him endlessly. He is a complicated character who can be a very good man, but also a very bad man.

Don Draper is joined by a rich cast of supporting characters, many of whom deserve a show of their own: The ambitious young Campbell who is utterly sleazy most of the time, but has occasional moments of growth and even cuteness.Peggy Olson starts out as Draper's secretary, but her growth into a strong, confident woman mirrors what is happening for Woman in the 60's. Silver fox Stirling - he may be morally bankrupt but gets some of the best lines. I could go on . . .

The 60's clothes, hairstyles, decor, and current events provide an interesting backdrop for what is essentially a character piece. The setting provides both the occasional laugh (cigarettes being advertised as "healthy") and the more than occasional cringe (how could dumping trash from a picnic in the park right on the grass ever seem okay?!).

If you need fast-paced action or a laugh track, this definitely isn't the show for you. But, if you like character development and subtlety in your television shows, rent the first seasons on DVD and settle in. You won't regret it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224554,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Mr. Mercedes
programme.desc: Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati. Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: The Last House on the Left
Poslednja kuća sa leve strane
programme.desc:
The Last House on the Left: Directed by Dennis Iliadis. With Garret Dillahunt, Michael Bowen, Josh Coxx, Riki Lindhome. After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0844708/","name":"The Last House on the Left","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExMTM4MDAwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODcyMDIzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge ta","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844708/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ametaphysicalshark"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A genuinely effective thriller","reviewBody":"The biggest problem with horror movies today, specifically major Hollywood productions, is that even more than romantic comedies and the like, it is treated by studios and directors as an entry level position. These aren't, after all, the big dramas or 'prestige' movies. The result is an endless barrage of derivative, uninteresting tripe, many of them remakes produced by the like of Michael Bay and directed by those attempting to get started in the industry. Why this is even more of a problem is because horror films and comedy films depend on one essential thing: timing. Those which fall in the category of 'suspense thrillers', those which don't really seek to scare as much as your average slasher, films like "The Last House on the Left", depend on atmosphere. They depend on the building of suspense and tension and dread, even when the outcome is insanely predictable. These films require a director who has talent with timing, with creating atmosphere, with building suspense, and most of the time, especially recently (sure, there have always been awful horror films, but there was a time when studios financed some respectable films at least), the directors who take on such projects seem either incapable or uninterested in doing all they can to make the film work.

"The Last House on the Left" is a 're-imagining' of Wes Craven's accidental classic from 1972. That film displays Craven's potential, but while certain sequences are compelling it is cheap, clumsy, has a bizarrely chirpy bluegrass score, some awful acting (and some good acting), and the movie's biggest flaw: a Benny Hill-like slapstick subplot. Still, the movie worked. It worked precisely because Craven managed to create that atmosphere. That feel. The biggest fear I had going into this 're-imagining' is that the director Dennis Iliadis would turn out to be another Marcus Nispel, coming off his one previous film from 2004, "Hardcore", a film about prostitutes I had never heard about.

I needn't have worried. The film is far from perfect, but Iliadis' direction is one of the film's strongest points. Along with the excellent photography the film creates a dark, foreboding, grimy atmosphere of horror, and wisely cuts out the original film's slapstick, and also fixes the score: replacing it with gorgeous, haunting compositions which occasionally give way to guitars, but thankfully not too often. Iliadis uses hand-held camera as well as anyone, not over-doing it at all, but filming everything with a stark sort of clarity, and he finds a surprisingly effective rhythm for the film which keeps it from ever being mundane. The director is one to watch out for in the horror and thriller genres. Perhaps his most impressive achievement in the film is the incredibly tasteful and brutally disturbing rape scene. The film, like the original, avoids the pornographic nature of many rape-revenge thrillers, such as "I Spit on Your Grave" or for a more recent example the 'unofficial' remake of "The Last House on the Left" from 2005: "Chaos", which was so gleefully vicious it became sickening, not effectively disturbing.

Michael Phillips said it best: "The way director Iliadis shapes the key misery-inducing sequence, there's no hype or slickness or attempt to make the rape palatable or visually "dynamic." For that you have to go see Watchmen." The performances help. The only weak one is Riki Lindhome as Sadie, the murderous Krug's girlfriend. She takes her top off more than once for the movie's unneeded but inevitable nudity, but does little else. Garret Dillahunt is great as Krug and the rest of the cast good too, especially Monica Potter as Emma, the raped Mary's mother.

I won't spoil the changes to the story for you but it does a lot to separate itself from the original. It's not a straight remake and the changes work. The film's ultimate triumph is its intimacy. Iliadis succeeds in putting you in Mary's place and in her parents' place. Not one who succumbs much to vengeful thinking, I was convinced by the film that I'd have done the same things were I in the place of Mary's father, John, played by Tony Goldwyn.

The film's major flaw is the very last scene, a nonsensical moment belonging more in a Stuart Gordon film than this one. Up to that point, in spite of some mediocre sequences, the film is a triumph of atmosphere and style, and is genuinely well-written. If you're looking for fun or an intellectually stimulating film look elsewhere. For a shockingly, shockingly good rape-revenge thriller look no further. This movie works. It doesn't only stand head and shoulders above every other recent horror remake (and certainly the ones out so far in 2009), but it is in a whole other league when compared to most of the genre films Hollywood forces down our throats."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-10-28","keywords":"kidnapping,psychopath,escaped convict,escaped killer,microwave oven","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last House on the Left","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3927704345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjgxN2UzYzktMWIwZC00NTJmLTg1NjktMDcyZGRhMDkxZDdjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjgxN2UzYzktMWIwZC00NTJmLTg1NjktMDcyZGRhMDkxZDdjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Clip; Emma pretends to seduce Francis"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0226813/","name":"Garret Dillahunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005321/","name":"Monica Potter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001282/","name":"Tony Goldwyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1531934/","name":"Dennis Iliadis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123433/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133024/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2085654/","name":"Adam Alleca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0255296/","name":"Carl Ellsworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExMTM4MDAwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODcyMDIzMg@@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: The Last House on the Left
Poslednja kuća sa leve strane
programme.desc: The Last House on the Left: Directed by Wes Craven. With Sandra Peabody, Lucy Grantham, David Hess, Fred J. Lincoln. Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0068833/","name":"The Last House on the Left","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY0YTZlNTQtNDg1YS00Y2IzLWJhZDctMmE2MDEzN2IzYzg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0068833/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Infofreak"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A landmark horror film which is still as powerful and disturbing as ever.","reviewBody":"'The Last House On The Left' is easily Wes Craven's most important movie. It was one of the most notorious movies of the early 70s but seems to be half forgotten now, despite being a groundbreaking horror film that opened up territory that had previously not been seen on screen. Romero's 'Night Of The Living Dead' deserves some acknowledgement as being the most realistic horror movie up until that point (the late 60s), but even that had a supernatural element, something 'Last House On The Left' eschews. Craven took the contemporary setting and natural performances of NOTLD and added some graphic violence and a confrontational rape sequence, most likely inspired by Peckinpah's 'Straw Dogs' released the previous year, and made it into something quite unlike anything seen before. This made it the father of all subsequent serial killer dramas. 'Last House...' is still a very nasty and disturbing movie thirty years after it was originally released. Craven was a beginning as a film maker and the budget was minimal, so the movie is rough and crudely made at times, but the best sequences have an almost documentary feel which gives it an appearance of realism that makes it sometimes really difficult to watch. The acting in the movie is variable. Mari's parents and the comic relief cops (who include Martin Kove later to appear in 'Death Race 2000' and countless action movies!) are pretty awful, but the two girls (Sandra Cassel and Lucy Grantham) are both very natural and believable, and Craven REALLY lucked out with Krug and his gang who are all very, very good. Krug is played by David Hess, who also composed and sang the songs on the soundtrack, something which makes him pretty unique! Hess wrote Elvis' 'All Shook Up' and 'I Got Stung' and yet his performance as Krug is totally convincing. Krug is still one of the creepiest and most repellent killers ever seen on screen. Comedian Marc Sheffler gives an interesting performance as Krug's junkie son, Fred J. Lincoln (now a porno director I believe!) is excellent as the aptly named Weasel, and Jeramie Rain is surprisingly good as Sadie, who brings to mind some of Manson's girls. These four actors are outstanding and really help make the movie into an unforgettable experience. Their scenes in the woods with the girls are still as powerful and disturbing as ever. 'Last House On The Left' is hardly the kind of movie you "enjoy" but I think it's a very important movie, and still the best thing Wes Craven has been involved with. It's really quite difficult to believe that Craven made something so uncompromising and nasty as this! I highly recommend 'The Last House On The Left' to anybody interested in the development of horror, screen violence, or disturbing movies of any kind. But be warned, it is NOT easy viewing and may be difficult for many people to take. I think it is worth it as it's still an extraordinary piece of work!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1972-08-30","keywords":"rape,sadistic murderer,female victim,escaped criminal,sadistic violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1816247833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNmNjY2MjktMzhhMi00ODM0LWJkYTctZTZiNDJmNmFkM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNmNjY2MjktMzhhMi00ODM0LWJkYTctZTZiNDJmNmFkM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144053/","name":"Sandra Peabody"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0335715/","name":"Lucy Grantham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381450/","name":"David Hess"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108859/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099633/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042922/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410694/","name":"Ulla Isaksson"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0068833, Title: The Last House on the Left, --- Description: The Last House on the Left: Directed by Wes Craven. With Sandra Peabody, Lucy Grantham, David Hess, Fred J. Lincoln. Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0068833/","name":"The Last House on the Left","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY0YTZlNTQtNDg1YS00Y2IzLWJhZDctMmE2MDEzN2IzYzg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychopathic convicts.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0068833/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Infofreak","dateCreated":"2003-06-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A landmark horror film which is still as powerful and disturbing as ever.","reviewBody":"'The Last House On The Left' is easily Wes Craven's most important movie. It was one of the most notorious movies of the early 70s but seems to be half forgotten now, despite being a groundbreaking horror film that opened up territory that had previously not been seen on screen. Romero's 'Night Of The Living Dead' deserves some acknowledgement as being the most realistic horror movie up until that point (the late 60s), but even that had a supernatural element, something 'Last House On The Left' eschews. Craven took the contemporary setting and natural performances of NOTLD and added some graphic violence and a confrontational rape sequence, most likely inspired by Peckinpah's 'Straw Dogs' released the previous year, and made it into something quite unlike anything seen before. This made it the father of all subsequent serial killer dramas. 'Last House...' is still a very nasty and disturbing movie thirty years after it was originally released. Craven was a beginning as a film maker and the budget was minimal, so the movie is rough and crudely made at times, but the best sequences have an almost documentary feel which gives it an appearance of realism that makes it sometimes really difficult to watch. The acting in the movie is variable. Mari's parents and the comic relief cops (who include Martin Kove later to appear in 'Death Race 2000' and countless action movies!) are pretty awful, but the two girls (Sandra Cassel and Lucy Grantham) are both very natural and believable, and Craven REALLY lucked out with Krug and his gang who are all very, very good. Krug is played by David Hess, who also composed and sang the songs on the soundtrack, something which makes him pretty unique! Hess wrote Elvis' 'All Shook Up' and 'I Got Stung' and yet his performance as Krug is totally convincing. Krug is still one of the creepiest and most repellent killers ever seen on screen. Comedian Marc Sheffler gives an interesting performance as Krug's junkie son, Fred J. Lincoln (now a porno director I believe!) is excellent as the aptly named Weasel, and Jeramie Rain is surprisingly good as Sadie, who brings to mind some of Manson's girls. These four actors are outstanding and really help make the movie into an unforgettable experience. Their scenes in the woods with the girls are still as powerful and disturbing as ever. 'Last House On The Left' is hardly the kind of movie you "enjoy" but I think it's a very important movie, and still the best thing Wes Craven has been involved with. It's really quite difficult to believe that Craven made something so uncompromising and nasty as this! I highly recommend 'The Last House On The Left' to anybody interested in the development of horror, screen violence, or disturbing movies of any kind. But be warned, it is NOT easy viewing and may be difficult for many people to take. I think it is worth it as it's still an extraordinary piece of work!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1972-08-30","keywords":"rape,sadistic murderer,female victim,escaped criminal,sadistic violence","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1816247833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNmNjY2MjktMzhhMi00ODM0LWJkYTctZTZiNDJmNmFkM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNmNjY2MjktMzhhMi00ODM0LWJkYTctZTZiNDJmNmFkM2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144053/","name":"Sandra Peabody","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0335715/","name":"Lucy Grantham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381450/","name":"David Hess"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108859/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099633/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042922/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410694/","name":"Ulla Isaksson"],"duration":"PT1H24M"</script><metacontent="

Frankenfish: Directed by Mark A.Z. Dippé. With Tory Kittles, K.D. Aubert, China Chow, Matthew Rauch. A genetically-altered fish wreaks havoc on a small fishing town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0384833/","name":"Frankenfish","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk0NmRiODktOGZmMC00NTk4LWE3MGYtNDgwNTZiZGQ1OTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQwMjk0NjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A genetically-altered fish wreaks havoc on a small fishing town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0384833/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Fella_shibby"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"A voracious fishzilla munching n slurping fellas enjoying a quiet life in the bayou.","reviewBody":"I first saw this years back on Sony Pix tv channel. Revisited it recently. I like horror n action films set in the bayou n swamps, especially Lousiana.

This is not bad for a tv movie. It has plenty of gore n kills. Simon Barrett is the writer of this film n this film n Dead Birds were his initial foray into horror films. Later he wrote many horror films. But as the poster claims, from the director (Mark A.Z. Dippé) of Spawn. Well, Spawn is his only good effort before this n after Frakenfish he went downhill. But his experience in special effects is noteworthy n this film does boast of some cool effects.

Also the poster is a rip off of Anaconda n whatever has been shown on the poster of this film, nothing like that happens in the entire film. In fact the lead actor never removes his shirt.

The film is about a genetically enhanced snakehead fish. Basically a voracious fishzilla trying to topple the croc, alligator, shark n piranha genre films. There is scene where a *ucktard stands so close to an edge knowing that there is an aquatic predator lurking in the water. We have a bad ass Ricardo, a war veteran who manages to get the the giant fish outside water so that viewers may have a glimpse of it.

It has some tits, especially that of the hottie Noelle Evans (Elizabeth Shue lookalike). I think she retired. Checked her Instagram n found her to be happily married, enjoying her bike riding.

The only actors recognizable r Tomas Arana Mark Boone Jr.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5141,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-10-09","keywords":"killer fish,topless sunbathing,swamp,louisiana,animal attack","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Frankenfish","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2244608793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmI3NDUzN2EtMzk3MC00MGE1LWJkODktNzU1NWI0ZWY4OTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmI3NDUzN2EtMzk3MC00MGE1LWJkODktNzU1NWI0ZWY4OTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0457796/","name":"Tory Kittles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1147702/","name":"K.D. programme.title: The Last House on the Left
Poslednja kuća sa leve strane
programme.desc:
The Last House on the Left: Directed by Dennis Iliadis. With Garret Dillahunt, Michael Bowen, Josh Coxx, Riki Lindhome. After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0844708/","name":"The Last House on the Left","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExMTM4MDAwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODcyMDIzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging to the parents of one of the victims: a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge ta","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844708/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ametaphysicalshark"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A genuinely effective thriller","reviewBody":"The biggest problem with horror movies today, specifically major Hollywood productions, is that even more than romantic comedies and the like, it is treated by studios and directors as an entry level position. These aren't, after all, the big dramas or 'prestige' movies. The result is an endless barrage of derivative, uninteresting tripe, many of them remakes produced by the like of Michael Bay and directed by those attempting to get started in the industry. Why this is even more of a problem is because horror films and comedy films depend on one essential thing: timing. Those which fall in the category of 'suspense thrillers', those which don't really seek to scare as much as your average slasher, films like "The Last House on the Left", depend on atmosphere. They depend on the building of suspense and tension and dread, even when the outcome is insanely predictable. These films require a director who has talent with timing, with creating atmosphere, with building suspense, and most of the time, especially recently (sure, there have always been awful horror films, but there was a time when studios financed some respectable films at least), the directors who take on such projects seem either incapable or uninterested in doing all they can to make the film work.

"The Last House on the Left" is a 're-imagining' of Wes Craven's accidental classic from 1972. That film displays Craven's potential, but while certain sequences are compelling it is cheap, clumsy, has a bizarrely chirpy bluegrass score, some awful acting (and some good acting), and the movie's biggest flaw: a Benny Hill-like slapstick subplot. Still, the movie worked. It worked precisely because Craven managed to create that atmosphere. That feel. The biggest fear I had going into this 're-imagining' is that the director Dennis Iliadis would turn out to be another Marcus Nispel, coming off his one previous film from 2004, "Hardcore", a film about prostitutes I had never heard about.

I needn't have worried. The film is far from perfect, but Iliadis' direction is one of the film's strongest points. Along with the excellent photography the film creates a dark, foreboding, grimy atmosphere of horror, and wisely cuts out the original film's slapstick, and also fixes the score: replacing it with gorgeous, haunting compositions which occasionally give way to guitars, but thankfully not too often. Iliadis uses hand-held camera as well as anyone, not over-doing it at all, but filming everything with a stark sort of clarity, and he finds a surprisingly effective rhythm for the film which keeps it from ever being mundane. The director is one to watch out for in the horror and thriller genres. Perhaps his most impressive achievement in the film is the incredibly tasteful and brutally disturbing rape scene. The film, like the original, avoids the pornographic nature of many rape-revenge thrillers, such as "I Spit on Your Grave" or for a more recent example the 'unofficial' remake of "The Last House on the Left" from 2005: "Chaos", which was so gleefully vicious it became sickening, not effectively disturbing.

Michael Phillips said it best: "The way director Iliadis shapes the key misery-inducing sequence, there's no hype or slickness or attempt to make the rape palatable or visually "dynamic." For that you have to go see Watchmen." The performances help. The only weak one is Riki Lindhome as Sadie, the murderous Krug's girlfriend. She takes her top off more than once for the movie's unneeded but inevitable nudity, but does little else. Garret Dillahunt is great as Krug and the rest of the cast good too, especially Monica Potter as Emma, the raped Mary's mother.

I won't spoil the changes to the story for you but it does a lot to separate itself from the original. It's not a straight remake and the changes work. The film's ultimate triumph is its intimacy. Iliadis succeeds in putting you in Mary's place and in her parents' place. Not one who succumbs much to vengeful thinking, I was convinced by the film that I'd have done the same things were I in the place of Mary's father, John, played by Tony Goldwyn.

The film's major flaw is the very last scene, a nonsensical moment belonging more in a Stuart Gordon film than this one. Up to that point, in spite of some mediocre sequences, the film is a triumph of atmosphere and style, and is genuinely well-written. If you're looking for fun or an intellectually stimulating film look elsewhere. For a shockingly, shockingly good rape-revenge thriller look no further. This movie works. It doesn't only stand head and shoulders above every other recent horror remake (and certainly the ones out so far in 2009), but it is in a whole other league when compared to most of the genre films Hollywood forces down our throats."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-10-28","keywords":"kidnapping,psychopath,escaped convict,escaped killer,microwave oven","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last House on the Left","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3927704345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjgxN2UzYzktMWIwZC00NTJmLTg1NjktMDcyZGRhMDkxZDdjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjgxN2UzYzktMWIwZC00NTJmLTg1NjktMDcyZGRhMDkxZDdjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Clip; Emma pretends to seduce Francis"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0226813/","name":"Garret Dillahunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005321/","name":"Monica Potter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001282/","name":"Tony Goldwyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1531934/","name":"Dennis Iliadis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123433/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133024/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2085654/","name":"Adam Alleca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0255296/","name":"Carl Ellsworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="
